summary: This is a certification by Apple Inc. custodian of records Lesley Ahlberg, verifying that Apple produced records (APL000001) on January 8, 2019 in response to a subpoena served on December 31, 2018. The document authenticates Apple's compliance with the legal request.

persons.name: Lesley Ahlberg
persons.role: Legal Specialist and Custodian of Records for Apple Inc.
persons.context: Apple employee who certifies the production of records in response to a subpoena related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Subpoena served on Apple Inc.
events.description: A subpoena was served on Apple Inc. requesting records related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Apple produces records in response to subpoena
events.description: Apple Inc. produced records (APL000001) in compliance with the subpoena served on December 31, 2018.

keyFacts: Apple Inc. was served with a subpoena on December 31, 2018, as part of the Epstein investigation.
Apple produced records (APL000001) on January 8, 2019 in response to the subpoena.
Lesley Ahlberg, a Legal Specialist at Apple, certified the records as authentic business records.
The document shows tech companies were compelled to provide records in the Epstein case.
The certification follows legal requirements for business record authentication under penalty of perjury.
